00064   TMS_Data::ListProgression*
00065   list() {
00066     
00067     //To check the sessionKey
00068     msessionServer.check();
00069 
00070     std::vector<std::string> results;

00077     std::string acLogin = UserServer(msessionServer).getUserAccountLogin(mmachineId);

00079     TMS_Data::TMS_DataFactory_ptr ecoreFactory = TMS_Data::TMS_DataFactory::_instance();
00080     mlistObject = ecoreFactory->createListProgression();
00081 
00082     std::string sqlRequest = "SELECT jobId, jobName, wallClockLimit, endDate, status, batchJobId from vsession, job where"
00083             " vsession.numsessionid=job.vsession_numsessionid and submitMachineId='"+mmachineId+"'";
00084 
00085     if(mparameters->getJobId().size()!=0) {
00086       std::string jobId = mparameters->getJobId();
00087       sqlRequest.append(" and jobId='"+jobId+"'");
00088       boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> sqlResult(ServerTMS::getInstance()->getDatabaseVishnu()->getResult(sqlRequest.c_str()));
00089       if(sqlResult->getNbTuples() == 0) {
00090         throw TMSVishnuException(ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_JOBID);        
00091       }
00092     } else {
00093       if(mparameters->getJobOwner().size()!=0) {
00094         acLogin = mparameters->getJobOwner(); 
00095       }
00096       sqlRequest.append(" and owner='"+acLogin+"'");
00097     }
00098 
00099     sqlRequest.append("  and status < 5 order by jobId");
00100     
00101     boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> sqlResult(ServerTMS::getInstance()->getDatabaseVishnu()->getResult(sqlRequest.c_str()));
00102 
00103     if (sqlResult->getNbTuples() != 0){
00104       for (size_t i = 0; i < sqlResult->getNbTuples(); ++i) {
00105 
00106         results.clear();
00107         results = sqlResult->get(i);
00108         iter = results.begin();
00109 
00110         TMS_Data::Progression_ptr job = ecoreFactory->createProgression();
00111 
00112         job->setJobId(*iter);
00113         job->setJobName(*(++iter));
00114         walltime = convertToInt(*(++iter));
00115         job->setWallTime(walltime);
00116         job->setEndTime(convertToTimeType(*(++iter)));
00117         status = convertToInt(*(++iter));
00118         job->setStatus(status);
00119         batchJobId = *(++iter);    
00120 
00121         BatchFactory factory;
00122         BatchType batchType  = ServerTMS::getInstance()->getBatchType(); 
00123         boost::scoped_ptr<BatchServer> batchServer(factory.getBatchServerInstance(batchType));
00124 
00125         startTime = batchServer->getJobStartTime(batchJobId); 
00126         if(startTime!=0) {
00127           job->setStartTime(startTime);
00128 
00129           if(status==5) {
00130             job->setPercent(100);  
00131           } else {
00132             time_t currentTime = vishnu::getCurrentTimeInUTC();
00133             int percent = 0;
00134             time_t gap = currentTime-startTime;
00135             if(walltime==0) {
00136                walltime = 60;
00137             }
00138 
00139             if(gap < walltime) {
00140               double ratio =  100*(double(gap)/walltime);
00141               if(ratio > 0.0 && ratio <= 1.0) {
00142                 percent = 1;
00143               } else {
00144                 percent = static_cast<int>(ratio);
00145               }
00146             } else {
00147               percent = 99;
00148             }
00149             job->setPercent(percent);
00150           } 
00151         } else {
00152           job->setPercent(0);
00153         }
00154         mlistObject->getProgress().push_back(job); 
00155       }
00156     }
00157     
00158     mlistObject->setNbJobs(mlistObject->getProgress().size());
00159    
00160     return mlistObject;
00161 
00162   }
